definitions.body: covering, clothing Ex 21:10, Ex 22:26 (Covt. code), De 22:12, Job 24:7, Job 31:19; of [[שַׂק]] as clothing of heavens Is 50:3 in fig.

covering for concealment, of Abaddon, the subterranean abode of the dead Job 26:6; [[עֵינַיִם]] ´[[כ]], covering of the eyes Ge 20:16 (so that they cannot see the wrong, fig. of a present offered in compensation for it; E).
